definition: 5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°

sentences.english: Stars become the official page, the stars become the novel to read.
sentences.chinese: 星辰变官方页面，星辰变小说阅读。

sentences.english: Stars become the official page, the stars become the novel to read.
sentences.chinese: 星辰变官方页面，星辰变小说阅读。

sentences.english: The stars that smile on their cottage send us the same twinkling look.
sentences.chinese: 在他们房上微笑的星辰，送给我们以同样的闪亮。

sentences.english: Rue Maarad cafes and restaurants off Place d'Etoile.
sentences.chinese: 马阿拉路的星辰广场上的咖啡馆及餐厅。

sentences.english: The stars hold their breath counting the hours, the feeble moon swims the deep night.
sentences.chinese: 星辰屏息地数着时刻，荏弱的月儿在夜中朴陋。

sentences.english: But if a man would be alone, let him look at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个人渴望独处，就请他注目于星辰吧。

sentences.english: Let me give you a shining star as a token of my blessing and concern.
sentences.chinese: 送给你一颗闪亮的星辰，略表我的祝福与关怀。

sentences.english: Look'd up in perfect silence at the stars.
sentences.chinese: 在纯然的寂静中仰望星辰。

sentences.english: I have stars in the sky but oh for my little lamp unlit in my house.
sentences.chinese: 我拥有满天星辰，但我为我家居未点亮的小灯而轻叹。

sentences.english: The first chapter discusses the Mongolian text of myth and evolution of stars.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，探讨了蒙古族星辰神话的文本及其演变。

sentences.english: With my bamboo pen holding bright stars, the moon I portray.
sentences.chinese: 用我那镶着明亮星辰的竹笔，我把月亮描画。

sentences.english: Sea King stars are drugs Doudou rule.
sentences.chinese: 海王星辰有治痘痘的药。

sentences.english: Before that time, navigators determined directions by looking at the positions of the sun, the moon and the stars.
sentences.chinese: 北宋前，航海者是利用日月星辰的位置来判定方向。

sentences.english: Zvezda has living and working quarters for astronauts and cosmonauts.
sentences.chinese: 星辰为宇航员们提供了生活和工作的场所。

sentences.english: I'm made of no end of prime of stars, trees and grass, mountains and rivers.
sentences.chinese: 我是由无数星辰日月草木山川的精华汇聚而成的。

sentences.english: The heliacal rising or setting of a star indicates to within a few days the date in the annual day-cycle.
sentences.chinese: 星辰偕日升降，说明了其在几天内年日循环的日期。

definition: many stars/a vast sky full of stars
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
